songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Yo, I hate it when this perc just gets me deep in my feelings
I feel I'm feelin' so happy, I'm always sad when you at me
But only go if it's rational, yuh uh
I've been out here dippin' through the inner state
Snort a gram of coke and choke to death
Until it's gone, falling all up on my dinner plate
Pop a shade, drinking lemonade
Looking back at all of this like yo
My demons now won't run away
My money now will multiply
I see some smiles on my face
This shit is fake, cause
When I lay back down, I'm laying down in my misery
In the black abyss so wild, I can't get rid of it
I was dead 3 hours born so tell me how I'm here
I was dead 3 hours born so tell me how I'm here

[Hook]
Floating on a cloud, I can't feel my face
I feel your aura so strong baby girl stay safe
Floating on a cloud, I can't feel my face
I feel your aura so strong baby girl stay safe

[Outro]
Floating on a cloud, I can't feel my face
I feel your aura so strong baby girl stay face
And if I..
And if I...
songs.title: Floating on a Cloud
